channel.title: [PI] Remove Final Modifier?
channel.description:
I followed a tut over at R-S and it tells me to do this.
And now Open your Config.java and remove the final modifier from these variables: SERVER_NAME ADMIN_CAN_TRADE ADMIN_DROP_ITEMS ADMIN_CAN_SELL_ITEMS
Ive searched but i cant find nothing and ive tried everything that come to mind, and i still get this error. [code]src\server\util\PanelSettings.java:339: cannot assign a value to final variable SERVER_NAME Config.SERVER_NAME = p.SERVER_NAME_TEXT.getText(); ^ src\server\util\PanelSettings.java:342: cannot assign a value to final variable ADMIN_CAN_TRADE Config.ADMIN_CAN_TRADE = p.ADMINS_CAN_TRADE.isSelected() ; ^ src\server\util\PanelSettings.java:343: cannot assign a value to final variable ADMIN_DROP_ITEMS Config.ADMIN_DROP_ITEMS = p.ADMINS_CAN_DROP.isSelected() ; ^ src\server\util\PanelSettings.java:344: cannot assign a value to final variable ADMIN_CAN_SELL_ITEMS Config.ADMIN_CAN_SELL_ITEMS = p.ADMINS_CAN_SELL_ITEMS.is Selected(); ^ Note: Some input files use unchecked or unsafe operations. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details. 4 errors Press any key to continue . . . [/code]

item.title: [PI] Remove Final Modifier?
item.dc:creator: @imsuperman05 imsuperman05
item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

[code]public static String SERVER_NAME = " ";

public static boolean ADMIN_CAN_TRADE = false; //can admins trade?
public static boolean ADMIN_CAN_SELL_ITEMS = false;// can admins sell items?
public static boolean ADMIN_DROP_ITEMS = false;// can admin drop items?[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Remove Final Modifier?
item.dc:creator: @genoarch genoarch
item.description:
@genoarch wrote:

I followed a tut over at R-S and it tells me to do this.

And now Open your Config.java and remove the final modifier from these variables: SERVER_NAME ADMIN_CAN_TRADE ADMIN_DROP_ITEMS ADMIN_CAN_SELL_ITEMS

Ive searched but i cant find nothing and ive tried everything that come to mind, and i still get this error.

src\server\util\PanelSettings.java:339: cannot assign a value to final variable SERVER_NAME Config.SERVER_NAME = p.SERVER_NAME_TEXT.getText(); ^ src\server\util\PanelSettings.java:342: cannot assign a value to final variable ADMIN_CAN_TRADE Config.ADMIN_CAN_TRADE = p.ADMINS_CAN_TRADE.isSelected() ; ^ src\server\util\PanelSettings.java:343: cannot assign a value to final variable ADMIN_DROP_ITEMS Config.ADMIN_DROP_ITEMS = p.ADMINS_CAN_DROP.isSelected() ; ^ src\server\util\PanelSettings.java:344: cannot assign a value to final variable ADMIN_CAN_SELL_ITEMS Config.ADMIN_CAN_SELL_ITEMS = p.ADMINS_CAN_SELL_ITEMS.is Selected(); ^ Note: Some input files use unchecked or unsafe operations. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details. 4 errors Press any key to continue . . .
